tool_description: Search IFSC, MICR, other details of a bank's branch just by a searchable API
name: India Bank Search
title: India Bank Search

api_list.name: Search with Bank Name and Branch Name
api_list.description: Allows you to search branch information just by loosly typing the bank name and branch or address of the bank's branch. Returns IFSC, MICR, ADDRESS, Transfer facility availbility etc.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://india-bank-search.p.rapidapi.com/api/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "india-bank-search.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://india-bank-search.p.rapidapi.com/api/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "india-bank-search.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
